content: Are you still thinking about today? Hohoho!

content: Is there any record of the "Little Bubble World" in the Neo Astralink files compiled by Loomi Co., Windchaser Guild, and Revelare Academia?

content: You've worked hard today! Have a chat with others and relax. If you're feeling tired, you can go home and <color=#8AAB4B>get into bed</color> for some rest.

content: The establishment of the <color=#8AAB4B>Astralink Station</color> marks the official opening of our Bubble World's Astralink. It's not that difficult to build an Astralink Station, hoho!

content: So please be assured. The Ecological Vitality Survey will be very successful, perhaps even better than before...
